heading: Is Bulgur gluten free?
intro: This public analysis report explains the biggest gluten risks in Bulgur and how to order more safely.

verdict.summary: Bulgur is made from cracked wheat, which contains gluten, posing a risk for individuals with coeliac disease. Cross-contamination during processing or preparation can also increase gluten exposure.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.

sections.title: Quick answer
sections.body: Bulgur can vary by recipe, ingredients, and cross-contact controls in the kitchen.

sections.title: Common gluten risks
sections.body: Watch for hidden sources like soy sauce, malt flavoring, marinades, thickeners, and shared fryers.
